meanings.definition: A type of soy sauce made without wheat.
meanings.sent1: I used tamari in my stir-fry instead of regular soy sauce.
meanings.sent2: The tamari added a delicious umami flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The tamari bottle told a funny joke to the soy sauce bottle.
meanings.sent4: The tamari flowed smoothly like a river of savory goodness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of tamari filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A Japanese seasoning made from fermented soybeans.
meanings.sent1: My sushi tasted amazing with a drizzle of tamari on top.
meanings.sent2: The tamari enhanced the flavor of the miso soup.
meanings.sent3: The tamari and wasabi had a dance-off in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sprinkle of tamari on a bland day.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret ingredient was a dash of tamari for extra depth of flavor.

meanings.definition: A gluten-free alternative to soy sauce.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using tamari in my cooking because it's gluten-free.
meanings.sent2: She packed a small bottle of tamari in her bag for the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The tamari bottle went on a gluten-free diet with the soy sauce bottle.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as comforting as a drizzle of tamari on a salad.
meanings.sent5: The tamari label proudly displayed the gluten-free symbol for all to see.
